name: 戴元峰
objective:
本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

2. 知識管理與產業創新轉型挑戰

8. 跨領域產業知識管理創新－(2) 數位與人工智慧產業
9. 跨領域產業知識管理創新－(3) 智慧醫療產業
10. 知識管理創新變革典範研討－1
